title: My Hero Academia
description: Go beyond! Plus Ultra! Test your hero knowledge!

questions.question: What is the name of Izuku Midoriya's inherited Quirk?
questions.explanation: One For All is the Quirk passed down from All Might to Deku, accumulating power through generations of users!

questions.question: Bakugo's Quirk is called Explosion.
questions.explanation: Bakugo's Quirk 'Explosion' lets him secrete nitroglycerin-like sweat from his palms and ignite it at will!

questions.question: What is the name of the hero academy that Deku attends?
questions.explanation: U.A. High School is Japan's top hero academy, where the motto is 'Plus Ultra'!

questions.question: Who is the homeroom teacher of Class 1-A?
questions.explanation: Shota Aizawa, hero name Eraserhead, is the homeroom teacher known for his logical approach and erasing Quirks!

questions.question: Todoroki can only use ice powers from his right side.
questions.explanation: Todoroki's ice comes from his right side (mother's Quirk) and fire from his left (father's Quirk). His Half-Cold Half-Hot Quirk is split down the middle!

questions.question: What is the name of the main villain organization?
questions.explanation: The League of Villains, led by Shigaraki, is the main villain organization that threatens hero society!

questions.question: Ochaco Uraraka's Quirk is called Zero Gravity.
questions.explanation: Uraraka's Quirk 'Zero Gravity' allows her to make objects float by touching them with all five fingers!

questions.question: What was All Might's real weakness before passing on One For All?

options.text: A serious injury limiting his hero form

questions.explanation: All Might suffered a devastating injury from All For One that damaged his respiratory system, limiting how long he could maintain his muscular hero form!
